metadata.title: CVE-2021-42739 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow flaw was found in the Linux kernel FireDTVmedia card driver, where the user calls the CA_SEND_MSG ioctl. This flawallows a local user of the host machine to crash the system or escalateprivileges on the system. The highest threat from this vulnerability is toconfidentiality, integrity, as well as system availability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
